handlingDuration.title: Handling Duration (Days)
handlingDuration.description: The amount of time in days from issue creation to issue resolution
handlingDuration.calculation: if (.properties.resolutionDate != null and .properties.created != null) then ((.properties.resolutionDate[0:19] + "Z" | fromdateiso8601) - (.properties.created[0:19] + "Z" | fromdateiso8601)) / 86400 else null end
